snippet: Stopchargingmaria won the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Distaff by a neck, giving the trainer Todd Pletcher and the jockey Javier Castellano their second victories Friday.
abstract: Stopchargingmaria wins Breeders’ Cup Distaff horse race on opening day of world championships at Keeneland in Lexington, Ky.
lead_paragraph: Stopchargingmaria won the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Distaff by a neck, giving the trainer Todd Pletcher and the jockey Javier Castellano their second victories Friday.
